manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Works Great The bidet was easy to install, just take off your toilet seat place the bidet on, then reinstall your toilet seat back on top of the bidet. All necessary parts were included to connect it to my toilet and it was straight forward to install. It was buying this bidet and would buy it again, good value for the money. Sleek and mighty Let’s be honest, we’re all scared of the bidet and definitely embarrassed to even talk or ask about it. Well let me tell you, it’s life changing. I always was curious about them but always scared to try. I ended up buying one to test out one time and it was so helpful! Overall, this is the absolute best investment you can make for you and your bathroom.
How to Install your Aresmata Bidet?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Plunge into Paradise
reviews.reviewText: Confession time: I used to be a toilet paper loyalist. Then, I met the Aresmata Ultra-Slim Bidet Attachment, and let's just say, it's been a game-changer. This little wonder has transformed my bathroom routine into a luxurious, eco-friendly spa experience, and I'm never going back!Slim and Chic, Not a Plumbing Nightmare:Forget bulky, Frankensteinian bidet attachments. The Aresmata is sleek and modern, seamlessly integrating with your existing toilet. It's so unobtrusive, it practically disappears, leaving only a hint of its transformative power. Installation was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions and included tools.Cleanliness Redefined: A Gentle Wash, Not a Water Cannon:This bidet isn't about blasting you into oblivion. It's about a gentle, targeted spray that leaves you feeling squeaky clean and refreshed. The adjustable water pressure and nozzle positions let you personalize your experience, from a delicate mist to a thorough cleansing. And say goodbye to the harsh chemicals of toilet paper; the natural cleansing power of water is all you need for a truly clean feeling.Environmentally Conscious, Wallet-Friendly Choice:No more deforestation for endless rolls of toilet paper! The Aresmata is a sustainable alternative, reducing your paper waste and saving you money in the long run. It's also gentle on your plumbing, requiring minimal water compared to traditional flushing.Self-cleaning nozzle: Hygiene is key, and this feature ensures a spotless experience every time.The Verdict: A Must-Have for Modern BathroomsThe Aresmata Ultra-Slim Bidet Attachment is more than just a gadget; it's an investment in your comfort, hygiene, and the environment. It's sleek, effective, and surprisingly affordable. If you're looking to elevate your bathroom routine and embrace a more sustainable lifestyle, look no further. Trust me, your rear end (and the planet) will thank you!Rating: 5 out of 5 sparkling clean stars!P.S. Don't just take my word for it! Check out the reviews from other bidet converts online. You might just be surprised at how much you'll love the clean life!I hope this review helps you decide if the Aresmata Ultra-Slim Bidet Attachment is right for you. Happy cleansing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation, push button use.
reviews.reviewText: This unit comes very well packaged and sealed. It is extremely lightweight and has minimal parts. The base that attaches to the top of the toilet bowl, beneath the seat attachment, has a positive locking mechanism to firmly secure the unit to your toilet and it can be unlocked to remove it for cleaning without disassembling your toilet seat situation all over again.My package did not contain the washer that instructions state should be included, but those are very inexpensive and readily available at my local hardware store so I'm not concerned with that. You may also wish to pick up an additional roll of Teflon tape for sealing all of the connections, depending on your skill with applying said tape and potentially running part of it before you're able to get everything assembled. Just a heads up there. Teflon tape is also very inexpensive and easy to get so I'm also not concerned with that.The button operation is really easy to operate. Buttons depress and release with little force needed. The dial is easy for me to operate as well, but if you have a disability or condition that very negatively affects your finger dexterity and/or grip capacity you may wish to consider a different style of unit.The instructions for installing are very straight forward if you have any experience assembling things. Even if this is your first time assembling or installing something like this, there are pictures included with the numbered, written instructions to make them easy to follow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome!!! But this it’s a game changer
reviews.reviewText: This thing is grrreat! My whole family uses it and have three other families using this too. Super easy to install, comes with everything you need, self cleaning nozzles, easy to use buttons( dumb dumb proof). With my arm in a sling currently this has saved me A LOT of trouble. The cool water doesn’t bother at all, in fact we all find it refreshing( it’s more like room temp). It’s more sanitary then other things we’ve used like wet wipes and saves soooo much money on other things like expensive toilet paper( as we only use to dry a bit.) our toddler even uses it lol this thing is great. I very rarely write reviews unless I feel strongly about something… I feel strongly this will help a lot of people and after searching and reviewing and finally buying and using this bidet I have to speak up so others can enjoy this bidet( unbeatable price right now too). It’s sized just right by the way, others look like a giant science potty project that you need an engineering degree to install and use! Just buy it… lol! You’ll love it and feel what all of us feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too Soon To Know, But.....
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. 4 stars only because longevity is unknown. Easy to install ( no tools required in my case), simple to use, does the job. Worth the price of $22 if it lasts.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to install, good quality and works great.
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and easy to install
Easy to install and good quality material and work well , no water leakage at all.

Say goodbye to endless toilet paper – the bidet keeps things clean and eco-friendly. Easy installation, no plumbing skills needed. It's a game-changer for hygiene and comfort. Upgrade your bathroom experience – it's like a mini spa moment every time. Less TP waste is a win for the planet. Trust me, your behind will thank you. Make the plunge – bidet for the win!

Came with everything I needed to get it connected, even a small reel of plumbing tape.All the connections are decent quality and the instructions are clear.It's a very simply but effective design.Happy with it
Iam very happy to have this attachment,it is very easy to assemble,working very efficiently and looking very nice 👍
